text: 6.19 Wkp 16.2-3, 16.12, 16.15, Hib 9.7 Chɨnop dɨtep gɨnɨgab ak kod mɨdobun nɨm ak, gos tɨmud nɨbi ak mɨdtep gɨl kɨles gɨnɨmɨb agak tek yonɨgun. Gos tɨmud anɨb ak, sip anka dɨ mɨdebal tek yonɨgun. Pen bɨ chɨnop dɨtep gɨnɨgab ak kod mɨdobun ak, Jisas nokom nɨm. Jisas ne amɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ chech palawl kanɨbtub pɨl gɨlak ak pɨskɨd amɨl, kaw ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ amnak.
